item.title: EP 268 - Haunted Sacramento
item.itunes:title: Haunted Sacramento
item.description:
Today we look at a trio of ghost stories from Sacramento!

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

J Street Ghosts

https://books.google.com/books?id=kAK1p91zJEwC&pg=PA64&lpg=PA64&dq=ghost+of+j+street+gold+coins+sacramento+ca&source=bl&ots=u3Xj5Mz9zl&sig=ACfU3U1Sw9ZB-R8vhTCbKrHx9Xq-ZVnsig&hl=en&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwiR5rbfqdbjAhX0KDQIHYo8D18Q6AEwAXoECAkQAQ#v=onepage&q=ghost%20of%20j%20street%20gold%20coins%20sacramento%20ca&f=false

 

Citrus Heights

https://books.google.com/books?id=kAK1p91zJEwC&pg=PA64&lpg=PA64&dq=citrus+heights+haunted+places+hauck&source=bl&ots=u3Xj5MB4wi&sig=ACfU3U2HfjV1CtX6H8Pvrgk6wzd6BxFN0g&hl=en&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjiwfCar9bjAhXE5p8KHQe7BqwQ6AEwBHoECBUQAQ#v=onepage&q=citrus%20heights%20haunted%20places%20hauck&f=false

 

Sacramento (detention facility)

http://encyclopedia.densho.org/Sacramento_(detention_facility)/

 

Camp Kohler

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Camp_Kohler

 

Camp Tulelake

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Camp_Tulelake

 

Unexplained Paranormal Suffering Is Normal At This California Mansion

https://backpackerverse.com/leland-sanford-mansion-sacramento/

 

Ghostly Lineage: Sacramento's 'Spooky' Stanford Mansion

https://www.abc10.com/article/news/local/sacramento/ghostly-lineage-sacramentos-spooky-stanford-mansion/103-603940813

 

The Truth About Leland Stanford Jr.

https://medium.com/stanford-magazine/the-truth-about-leland-stanford-jr-9d48fbf5623a

 

Leland Stanford Mansion

https://www.hauntedhoneymoon.com/hauntedplaces/stanfordmansion.html

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
